snippet: The issue of gay rights is on the formal agenda for Davos. | Regulatory actions in China hit shares. | PepsiCo and Nelson Peltz announce a truce. | The apparent murder of a hedge fund manager by his son and the price of privilege.
abstract: The issue of gay rights is on the formal agenda for Davos. | Regulatory actions in China hit shares. | PepsiCo and Nelson Peltz announce a truce. | The apparent murder of a hedge fund manager by his son and the price of privilege.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Davos Takes Up Gay Rights
